titleStmt.title: A proclamation, against deserters, and resetting of them.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Scotland. Sovereign (1689-1694 : William and Mary)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heirs and successors of Andrew Anderson, Printer to their most excellent Majesties,

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Gilb. Eliot. Cls. Sti. Concilii.
Dated: Given under Our Signet at Edinburgh, the fourth day of April. And of Our Reign the fifth year, 1694.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.

person.persName: the heirs and successors of Andrew Anderson
